name: Avishka Gunawardene
bio: Dihan Avishka Gunawardene (born May 26, 1977 in Colombo[1]), is a former Sri Lankan cricketer, who played Tests and ODIs. He served as the Sri Lanka A team coach for many years,[2][3] and was later appointed batting coach of the national team in 2017. At Present, he is the Head Coach of the Sri Lanka Under-19 cricket team.
